info.name: HRMS API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for HRMS (Human Resource Management System)

request.description:
Returns all departments with custom and master departments.
Response includes:
- id: Department ID
- code: Department code (NULL for custom)
- name: company_department_name OR master department_name
- is_custom: true/false flag
- department_id: Master department ID (NULL for custom)
